org.spongepowered.api.event.server.query

Interface BasicQueryEvent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Event, GameEvent, QueryEvent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullQueryEvent

    public interface BasicQueryEvent
extends QueryEvent
    Called when the server is queried through the Query protocol, with only basic information requested.
